verses.verse: <S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H2491>slain<s%> person is <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5307>lying<s%> in the open <S%H7704>country<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess,<s%> [and] it is not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H5221>struck<s%> him,

then your <S%H2205>elders<s%> and your <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H4058>measure<s%> [the distance] to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H2491>one.<s%>

"And it shall be that the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H2491>man,<s%> that is, the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city,<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has not been <S%H5647>worked<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> has not <S%H4900>pulled<s%> in a <S%H5923>yoke;<s%>

and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to a <S%H5158>valley<s%> with <S%H386>running<s%> <S%H386>water,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has not been <S%H5647>plowed<s%> or <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and shall <S%H6202>break<s%> the heifer's <S%H6202>neck<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> shall <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> them to <S%H8334>serve<s%> Him and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7379>dispute<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5061>assault<s%> shall be <S%H5921>settled<s%> <S%H6310><s%> by them.

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H2491>man<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> whose <S%H6202>neck<s%> was <S%H6202>broken<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley;<s%>

and they shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Our <S%H3027>hands<s%> have not <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> [it.]

<S%H3722>'Forgive<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and do not <S%H5414>place<s%> the <S%H1818>guilt<s%> of <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>' And the <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> shall be <S%H3722>forgiven<s%> them.

"So you shall <S%H1197>remove<s%> the <S%H1818>guilt<s%> of <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivers<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and you <S%H7617>take<s%> them away <S%H7628>captive,<s%>

and <S%H7200>see<s%> among the <S%H7633>captives<s%> a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H2836>have<s%> a <S%H2836>desire<s%> for her and would <S%H3947>take<s%> her as a <S%H802>wife<s%> for yourself,
then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H8432>home<s%> to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and she shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> her <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H6213>trim<s%> her <S%H6856>nails.<s%>

"She shall also <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H8071>clothes<s%> of her <S%H7628>captivity<s%> and shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1058>mourn<s%> her father and <S%H1>mother<s%> a <S%H517>full<s%> <S%H3117>month;<s%> and <S%H3391>after<s%> that you may <S%H310>go<s%> in to her and be her <S%H935>husband<s%> and she shall be your <S%H1166>wife.<s%>

"And it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> you are not <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with her, then you shall <S%H7971>let<s%> her <S%H7971>go<s%> wherever she <S%H5315>wishes;<s%> but you shall <S%H4376>certainly<s%> not <S%H4376>sell<s%> her for <S%H3701>money,<s%> you shall not <S%H9417>mistreat<s%> her, <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H8130>unloved,<s%> and [both] the <S%H157>loved<s%> and the <S%H8130>unloved<s%> have <S%H3205>borne<s%> him <S%H1121>sons,<s%> if the first-born <S%H1121>son<s%> belongs to the <S%H8146>unloved,<s%>

then it shall be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H5157>wills<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H1961>has<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1069>make<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H157>loved<s%> the first-born <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>unloved,<s%> who is the first-born.

"But he shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> the first-born, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H8130>unloved,<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him a <S%H8147>double<s%> <S%H6310>portion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H4672>has,<s%> for he is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H202>strength;<s%> to him belongs the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the first-born.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> who will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother,<s%> and when they <S%H517>chastise<s%> him, he will not even <S%H3256>listen<s%> to them,

then his father and <S%H1>mother<s%> shall <S%H517>seize<s%> him, and <S%H8610>bring<s%> him out to the <S%H3318>elders<s%> of his <S%H2205>city<s%> at the <S%H5892>gateway<s%> of his <S%H8179>home<s%> <S%H4725>town.<s%>

"And they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of ours is <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> he will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> us, he is a <S%H9105>glutton<s%> and a <S%H9352>drunkard.<s%>'

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him to <S%H4191>death;<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>remove<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> [of it] and <S%H3372>fear.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H1961>committed<s%> a <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> and he is <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and you <S%H8518>hang<s%> him on a <S%H6086>tree,<s%>

his <S%H5038>corpse<s%> shall not <S%H3885>hang<s%> all <S%H3885>night<s%> on the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> but you shall <S%H6912>surely<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> him on the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> (for he who is <S%H8518>hanged<s%> is <S%H7045>accursed<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>), so that you do not <S%H2930>defile<s%> your <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
